description: A simple head-or-tails game where the user must guess 'heads' or 'tails'. The game keeps track of the user's score. Call 'user_input' only when user has clearly given the either of the choice. Other variations of the 'boolean' game are also possible, where user needs to pick up a choice between two options.

user_input.description: The user must say 'heads' or 'tails'. The game keeps track of the user's score.
